069@CommandDeclaration(command = "flag",
070        aliases = {"f", "flag"},
071        usage = "/plot flag <set | remove | add | list | info> <flag> <value>",
072        category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
073        requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
074        permission = "plots.flag")
075@SuppressWarnings("unused")
076public final class FlagCommand extends Command {
077
078    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
079
080    @Inject
081    public FlagCommand(final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher) {
082        super(MainCommand.getInstance(), true);
083        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
084    }
085
086    private static boolean sendMessage(PlotPlayer<?> player) {
087        player.sendMessage(
088                TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
089                TagResolver.resolver(
090                        "value",
091                        Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot flag <set | remove | add | list | info> <flag> <value>"))
092                )
093        );
094        return true;
095    }
096
097    private static boolean checkPermValue(
098            final @NonNull PlotPlayer<?> player,
099            final @NonNull PlotFlag<?, ?> flag, @NonNull String key, @NonNull String value
100    ) {
101        key = key.toLowerCase();
102        value = value.toLowerCase();
103        String perm = Permission.PERMISSION_SET_FLAG_KEY_VALUE.format(key.toLowerCase(), value.toLowerCase());
104        if (flag instanceof IntegerFlag && MathMan.isInteger(value)) {
105            try {
106                int numeric = Integer.parseInt(value);
107                perm = perm.substring(0, perm.length() - value.length() - 1);
108                boolean result = false;
109                if (numeric > 0) {
110                    int checkRange = PlotSquared.get().getPlatform().equalsIgnoreCase("bukkit") ?
111                            numeric :
112                            Settings.Limit.MAX_PLOTS;
113                    result = player.hasPermissionRange(perm, checkRange) >= numeric;
114                }
115                if (!result) {
116                    player.sendMessage(
117                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
118                            TagResolver.resolver(
119                                    "node",
120                                    Tag.inserting(Component.text(perm + "." + numeric))
121                            )
122                    );
123                }
124                return result;
125            } catch (NumberFormatException ignore) {
126            }
127        } else if (flag instanceof final ListFlag<?, ?> listFlag) {
128            try {
129                PlotFlag<? extends List<?>, ?> parsedFlag = listFlag.parse(value);
130                for (final Object entry : parsedFlag.getValue()) {
131                    final String permission = Permission.PERMISSION_SET_FLAG_KEY_VALUE.format(
132                            key.toLowerCase(),
133                            entry.toString().toLowerCase()
134                    );
135                    final boolean result = Permissions.hasPermission(player, permission);
136                    if (!result) {
137                        player.sendMessage(
138                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
139                                TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text(permission)))
140                        );
141                        return false;
142                    }
143                }
144            } catch (final FlagParseException e) {
145                player.sendMessage(
146                        TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_parse_error"),
147                        TagResolver.builder()
148                                .tag("flag_name", Tag.inserting(Component.text(flag.getName())))
149                                .tag("flag_value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(e.getValue())))
150                                .tag("error", Tag.inserting(e.getErrorMessage().toComponent(player)))
151                                .build()
152                );
153                return false;
154            } catch (final Exception e) {
155                return false;
156            }
157            return true;
158        }
159        boolean result;
160        String basePerm = Permission.PERMISSION_SET_FLAG_KEY.format(key.toLowerCase());
161        if (flag.isValuedPermission()) {
162            result = Permissions.hasKeyedPermission(player, basePerm, value);
163        } else {
164            result = Permissions.hasPermission(player, basePerm);
165            perm = basePerm;
166        }
167        if (!result) {
168            player.sendMessage(
169                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
170                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text(perm)))
171            );
172        }
173        return result;
174    }
175
176    /**
177     * Checks if the player is allowed to modify the flags at their current location
178     *
179     * @return {@code true} if the player is allowed to modify the flags at their current location
180     */
181    private static boolean checkRequirements(final @NonNull PlotPlayer<?> player) {
182        final Location location = player.getLocation();
183        final Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
184        if (plot == null) {
185            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
186            return false;
187        }
188        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
189            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("working.plot_not_claimed"));
190            return false;
191        }
192        if (!plot.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
193                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_SET_FLAG_OTHER)) {
194            player.sendMessage(
195                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
196                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_SET_FLAG_OTHER))
197            );
198            return false;
199        }
200        return true;
201    }
202
203    /**
204     * Attempt to extract the plot flag from the command arguments. If the flag cannot
205     * be found, a flag suggestion may be sent to the player.
206     *
207     * @param player Player executing the command
208     * @param arg    String to extract flag from
209     * @return The flag, if found, else null
210     */
211    @Nullable
212    private static PlotFlag<?, ?> getFlag(
213            final @NonNull PlotPlayer<?> player,
214            final @NonNull String arg
215    ) {
216        if (arg.length() > 0) {
217            final PlotFlag<?, ?> flag = GlobalFlagContainer.getInstance().getFlagFromString(arg);
218            if (flag instanceof InternalFlag || flag == null) {
219                boolean suggested = false;
220                try {
221                    final StringComparison<PlotFlag<?, ?>> stringComparison =
222                            new StringComparison<>(
223                                    arg,
224                                    GlobalFlagContainer.getInstance().getFlagMap().values(),
225                                    PlotFlag::getName
226                            );
227                    final String best = stringComparison.getBestMatch();
228                    if (best != null) {
229                        player.sendMessage(
230                                TranslatableCaption.of("flag.not_valid_flag_suggested"),
231                                TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(best)))
232                        );
233                        suggested = true;
234                    }
235                } catch (final Exception ignored) { /* Happens sometimes because of mean code */ }
236                if (!suggested) {
237                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.not_valid_flag"));
238                }
239                return null;
240            }
241            return flag;
242        }
243        return null;
244    }
245
246    @Override
247    public CompletableFuture<Boolean> execute(
248            PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args,
249            RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
250            RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
251    ) throws CommandException {
252        if (args.length == 0 || !Arrays
253                .asList("set", "s", "list", "l", "delete", "remove", "r", "add", "a", "info", "i")
254                .contains(args[0].toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH))) {
255            new HelpMenu(player).setCategory(CommandCategory.SETTINGS)
256                    .setCommands(this.getCommands()).generateMaxPages()
257                    .generatePage(0, getParent().toString(), player).render();
258            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(true);
259        }
260        return super.execute(player, args, confirm, whenDone);
261    }
262
263    @Override
264    public Collection<Command> tab(
265            final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args,
266            final boolean space
267    ) {
268        if (args.length == 1) {
269            return Stream
270                    .of("set", "add", "remove", "delete", "info", "list")
271                    .filter(value -> value.startsWith(args[0].toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH)))
272                    .map(value -> new Command(null, false, value, "", RequiredType.NONE, null) {
273                    }).collect(Collectors.toList());
274        } else if (Arrays.asList("set", "add", "remove", "delete", "info")
275                .contains(args[0].toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH)) && args.length == 2) {
276            return GlobalFlagContainer.getInstance().getRecognizedPlotFlags().stream()
277                    .filter(flag -> !(flag instanceof InternalFlag))
278                    .filter(flag -> flag.getName().startsWith(args[1].toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH)))
279                    .map(flag -> new Command(null, false, flag.getName(), "", RequiredType.NONE, null) {
280                    }).collect(Collectors.toList());
281        } else if (Arrays.asList("set", "add", "remove", "delete")
282                .contains(args[0].toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH)) && args.length == 3) {
283            try {
284                final PlotFlag<?, ?> flag =
285                        GlobalFlagContainer.getInstance().getFlagFromString(args[1]);
286                if (flag != null) {
287                    Stream<String> stream = flag.getTabCompletions().stream();
288                    if (flag instanceof ListFlag && args[2].contains(",")) {
289                        final String[] split = args[2].split(",");
290                        // Prefix earlier values onto all suggestions
291                        StringBuilder prefix = new StringBuilder();
292                        for (int i = 0; i < split.length - 1; i++) {
293                            prefix.append(split[i]).append(",");
294                        }
295                        final String cmp;
296                        if (!args[2].endsWith(",")) {
297                            cmp = split[split.length - 1];
298                        } else {
299                            prefix.append(split[split.length - 1]).append(",");
300                            cmp = "";
301                        }
302                        return stream
303                                .filter(value -> value.startsWith(cmp.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH))).map(
304                                        value -> new Command(null, false, prefix + value, "",
305                                                RequiredType.NONE, null
306                                        ) {
307                                        }).collect(Collectors.toList());
308                    } else {
309                        return stream
310                                .filter(value -> value.startsWith(args[2].toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH)))
311                                .map(value -> new Command(null, false, value, "", RequiredType.NONE,
312                                        null
313                                ) {
314                                }).collect(Collectors.toList());
315                    }
316                }
317            } catch (final Exception ignored) {
318            }
319        }
320        return tabOf(player, args, space);
321    }
322
323    @CommandDeclaration(command = "set",
324            aliases = {"s", "set"},
325            usage = "/plot flag set <flag> <value>",
326            category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
327            requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
328            permission = "plots.set.flag")
329    public void set(
330            final Command command, final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args,
331            final RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
332            final RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
333    ) {
334        if (!checkRequirements(player)) {
335            return;
336        }
337        if (args.length < 2) {
338            player.sendMessage(
339                    TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
340                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot flag set <flag> <value>")))
341            );
342            return;
343        }
344        final PlotFlag<?, ?> plotFlag = getFlag(player, args[0]);
345        if (plotFlag == null) {
346            return;
347        }
348        Plot plot = player.getLocation().getPlotAbs();
349        PlotFlagAddEvent event = eventDispatcher.callFlagAdd(plotFlag, plot);
350        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
351            player.sendMessage(
352                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
353                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Flag set")))
354            );
355            return;
356        }
357        boolean force = event.getEventResult() == Result.FORCE;
358        String value = StringMan.join(Arrays.copyOfRange(args, 1, args.length), " ");
359        if (!force && !checkPermValue(player, plotFlag, args[0], value)) {
360            return;
361        }
362        value = CaptionUtility.stripClickEvents(plotFlag, value);
363        final PlotFlag<?, ?> parsed;
364        try {
365            parsed = plotFlag.parse(value);
366        } catch (final FlagParseException e) {
367            player.sendMessage(
368                    TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_parse_error"),
369                    TagResolver.builder()
370                            .tag("flag_name", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plotFlag.getName())))
371                            .tag("flag_value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(e.getValue())))
372                            .tag("error", Tag.inserting(e.getErrorMessage().toComponent(player)))
373                            .build()
374            );
375            return;
376        }
377        plot.setFlag(parsed);
378        player.sendMessage(
379                TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_added"),
380                TagResolver.builder()
381                        .tag("flag", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[0])))
382                        .tag("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(parsed.toString())))
383                        .build()
384        );
385    }
386
387    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked", "rawtypes"})
388    @CommandDeclaration(command = "add",
389            aliases = {"a", "add"},
390            usage = "/plot flag add <flag> <value>",
391            category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
392            requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
393            permission = "plots.flag.add")
394    public void add(
395            final Command command, PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args,
396            final RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
397            final RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
398    ) {
399        if (!checkRequirements(player)) {
400            return;
401        }
402        if (args.length < 2) {
403            player.sendMessage(
404                    TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
405                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot flag add <flag> <values>")))
406            );
407            return;
408        }
409        final PlotFlag<?, ?> plotFlag = getFlag(player, args[0]);
410        if (plotFlag == null) {
411            return;
412        }
413        Plot plot = player.getLocation().getPlotAbs();
414        PlotFlagAddEvent event = eventDispatcher.callFlagAdd(plotFlag, plot);
415        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
416            player.sendMessage(
417                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
418                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Flag add")))
419            );
420            return;
421        }
422        boolean force = event.getEventResult() == Result.FORCE;
423        final PlotFlag localFlag = player.getLocation().getPlotAbs().getFlagContainer()
424                .getFlag(event.getFlag().getClass());
425        if (!force) {
426            for (String entry : args[1].split(",")) {
427                if (!checkPermValue(player, event.getFlag(), args[0], entry)) {
428                    return;
429                }
430            }
431        }
432        final String value = StringMan.join(Arrays.copyOfRange(args, 1, args.length), " ");
433        final PlotFlag parsed;
434        try {
435            parsed = event.getFlag().parse(value);
436        } catch (FlagParseException e) {
437            player.sendMessage(
438                    TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_parse_error"),
439                    TagResolver.builder()
440                            .tag("flag_name", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plotFlag.getName())))
441                            .tag("flag_value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(e.getValue())))
442                            .tag("error", Tag.inserting(e.getErrorMessage().toComponent(player)))
443                            .build()
444            );
445            return;
446        }
447        boolean result =
448                player.getLocation().getPlotAbs().setFlag(localFlag.merge(parsed.getValue()));
449        if (!result) {
450            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_not_added"));
451            return;
452        }
453        player.sendMessage(
454                TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_added"),
455                TagResolver.builder()
456                        .tag("flag", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[0])))
457                        .tag("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(parsed.toString())))
458                        .build()
459        );
460    }
461
462    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked", "rawtypes"})
463    @CommandDeclaration(command = "remove",
464            aliases = {"r", "remove", "delete"},
465            usage = "/plot flag remove <flag> [values]",
466            category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
467            requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
468            permission = "plots.flag.remove")
469    public void remove(
470            final Command command, PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args,
471            final RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
472            final RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
473    ) {
474        if (!checkRequirements(player)) {
475            return;
476        }
477        if (args.length != 1 && args.length != 2) {
478            player.sendMessage(
479                    TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
480                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot flag remove <flag> [values]")))
481            );
482            return;
483        }
484        PlotFlag<?, ?> flag = getFlag(player, args[0]);
485        if (flag == null) {
486            return;
487        }
488        final Plot plot = player.getLocation().getPlotAbs();
489        final PlotFlag<?, ?> flagWithOldValue = plot.getFlagContainer().getFlag(flag.getClass());
490        PlotFlagRemoveEvent event = eventDispatcher.callFlagRemove(flag, plot);
491        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
492            player.sendMessage(
493                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
494                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Flag remove")))
495            );
496            return;
497        }
498        boolean force = event.getEventResult() == Result.FORCE;
499        flag = event.getFlag();
500        if (!force && !Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_SET_FLAG_KEY.format(args[0].toLowerCase()))) {
501            if (args.length != 2) {
502                player.sendMessage(
503                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
504                        TagResolver.resolver(
505                                "node",
506                                Tag.inserting(Component.text(Permission.PERMISSION_SET_FLAG_KEY.format(args[0].toLowerCase())))
507                        )
508                );
509                return;
510            }
511        }
512        if (args.length == 2 && flag instanceof final ListFlag<?, ?> listFlag) {
513            String value = StringMan.join(Arrays.copyOfRange(args, 1, args.length), " ");
514            final List<?> list =
515                    new ArrayList<>(plot.getFlag((Class<? extends ListFlag<?, ?>>) listFlag.getClass()));
516            final PlotFlag parsedFlag;
517            try {
518                parsedFlag = listFlag.parse(value);
519            } catch (final FlagParseException e) {
520                player.sendMessage(
521                        TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_parse_error"),
522                        TagResolver.builder()
523                                .tag("flag_name", Tag.inserting(Component.text(flag.getName())))
524                                .tag("flag_value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(e.getValue())))
525                                .tag("error", Tag.inserting(e.getErrorMessage().toComponent(player)))
526                                .build()
527                );
528                return;
529            }
530            if (((List<?>) parsedFlag.getValue()).isEmpty()) {
531                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_not_removed"));
532                return;
533            }
534            if (list.removeAll((List) parsedFlag.getValue())) {
535                if (list.isEmpty()) {
536                    if (plot.removeFlag(flag)) {
537                        player.sendMessage(
538                                TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_removed"),
539                                TagResolver.builder()
540                                        .tag("flag", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[0])))
541                                        .tag("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(flag.toString())))
542                                        .build()
543                        );
544                        return;
545                    } else {
546                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_not_removed"));
547                        return;
548                    }
549                } else {
550                    PlotFlag<?, ?> plotFlag = parsedFlag.createFlagInstance(list);
551                    PlotFlagAddEvent addEvent = eventDispatcher.callFlagAdd(plotFlag, plot);
552                    if (addEvent.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
553                        player.sendMessage(
554                                TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
555                                TagResolver.resolver(
556                                        "value",
557                                        Tag.inserting(Component.text("Re-addition of " + plotFlag.getName()))
558                                )
559                        );
560                        return;
561                    }
562                    if (plot.setFlag(addEvent.getFlag())) {
563                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_partially_removed"));
564                        return;
565                    } else {
566                        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_not_removed"));
567                        return;
568                    }
569                }
570            } else {
571                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_not_removed"));
572                return;
573            }
574        } else {
575            boolean result = plot.removeFlag(flag);
576            if (!result) {
577                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_not_removed"));
578                return;
579            }
580        }
581        player.sendMessage(
582                TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_removed"),
583                TagResolver.builder()
584                        .tag("flag", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[0])))
585                        .tag("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(flag.toString())))
586                        .build()
587        );
588    }
589
590    @CommandDeclaration(command = "list",
591            aliases = {"l", "list", "flags"},
592            usage = "/plot flag list",
593            category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
594            requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
595            permission = "plots.flag.list")
596    public void list(
597            final Command command, final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args,
598            final RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
599            final RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
600    ) {
601        if (!checkRequirements(player)) {
602            return;
603        }
604
605        final Map<Component, ArrayList<String>> flags = new HashMap<>();
606        for (PlotFlag<?, ?> plotFlag : GlobalFlagContainer.getInstance().getRecognizedPlotFlags()) {
607            if (plotFlag instanceof InternalFlag) {
608                continue;
609            }
610            final Component category = plotFlag.getFlagCategory().toComponent(player);
611            final Collection<String> flagList = flags.computeIfAbsent(category, k -> new ArrayList<>());
612            flagList.add(plotFlag.getName());
613        }
614
615        for (final Map.Entry<Component, ArrayList<String>> entry : flags.entrySet()) {
616            Collections.sort(entry.getValue());
617            Component category =
618                    MINI_MESSAGE.deserialize(
619                            TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_list_categories").getComponent(player),
620                            TagResolver.resolver("category", Tag.inserting(entry.getKey().style(Style.empty())))
621                    );
622            TextComponent.Builder builder = Component.text().append(category);
623            final Iterator<String> flagIterator = entry.getValue().iterator();
624            while (flagIterator.hasNext()) {
625                final String flag = flagIterator.next();
626                builder.append(MINI_MESSAGE
627                        .deserialize(
628                                TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_list_flag").getComponent(player),
629                                TagResolver.builder()
630                                        .tag("command", Tag.preProcessParsed("/plot flag info " + flag))
631                                        .tag("flag", Tag.inserting(Component.text(flag)))
632                                        .tag("suffix", Tag.inserting(Component.text(flagIterator.hasNext() ? ", " : "")))
633                                        .build()
634                        ));
635            }
636            player.sendMessage(StaticCaption.of(MINI_MESSAGE.serialize(builder.build())));
637        }
638    }
639
640    @CommandDeclaration(command = "info",
641            aliases = {"i", "info"},
642            usage = "/plot flag info <flag>",
643            category = CommandCategory.SETTINGS,
644            requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
645            permission = "plots.flag.info")
646    public void info(
647            final Command command, final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args,
648            final RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
649            final RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
650    ) {
651        if (!checkRequirements(player)) {
652            return;
653        }
654        if (args.length < 1) {
655            player.sendMessage(
656                    TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
657                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("/plot flag info <flag>")))
658            );
659            return;
660        }
661        final PlotFlag<?, ?> plotFlag = getFlag(player, args[0]);
662        if (plotFlag != null) {
663            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_info_header"));
664            // Flag name
665            player.sendMessage(
666                    TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_info_name"),
667                    TagResolver.resolver("flag", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plotFlag.getName())))
668            );
669            // Flag category
670            player.sendMessage(
671                    TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_info_category"),
672                    TagResolver.resolver(
673                            "value",
674                            Tag.inserting(plotFlag.getFlagCategory().toComponent(player))
675                    )
676            );
677            // Flag description
678            // TODO maybe merge and \n instead?
679            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_info_description"));
680            player.sendMessage(plotFlag.getFlagDescription());
681            // Flag example
682            player.sendMessage(
683                    TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_info_example"),
684                    TagResolver.builder()
685                            .tag("command", Tag.preProcessParsed("/plot flag set"))
686                            .tag("flag", Tag.preProcessParsed(plotFlag.getName()))
687                            .tag("value", Tag.preProcessParsed(plotFlag.getExample()))
688                            .build()
689            );
690            // Default value
691            final String defaultValue = player.getLocation().getPlotArea().getFlagContainer()
692                    .getFlagErased(plotFlag.getClass()).toString();
693            player.sendMessage(
694                    TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_info_default_value"),
695                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(defaultValue)))
696            );
697            // Footer. Done this way to prevent the duplicate-message-thingy from catching it
698            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("flag.flag_info_footer"));
699        }
700    }
701
702}
